name: ECHO (itch) (Mermaid MenZ, 🦖Deerex, Christian_03, ethonk, wilbblur, ethan_322)
name_original: ECHO (itch) (Mermaid MenZ, 🦖Deerex, Christian_03, ethonk, wilbblur, ethan_322)
description:
Overview

After finding an abandoned factory, full to the brim with pristine yet abandoned robot parts made from valuable materials to sell for high prices, you make your way inside to pick up what feels like the discovery of a lifetime. However, as soon as you step foot into the entrance the front gate closes, preventing you from leaving. With only your wits and a cheap wind up torch you must find your way out of the factory without alerting the sleeping automatons. Perhaps the valuables were left untouched for a very good reason.

Controls:

WASD - Move
SHIFT - Sprint
CTRL - Crouch
E - Interact
LMB - Throw
Hold RMB - Charge Torch

Developed by The Mermaid MenZ

Ethan Uy - Team Lead, Programming Lead 
Wilbur Arnott - Game Design Lead
Darren Contreras - Art Lead, Character Designer, Voice Overs
Christian Logoia - 3D Generalist Artist, Robots, Graybox
Ethan Buot - Level Designer, Environment and Set Dressing
